caption: A group of people gathered in an office, watching a news report. They moved to another room with sofas to continue their discussion. One lady in pink explained something to everyone. Another woman took out a computer to show them real-time news updates. The woman in pink pointed at people and then stood up, walking to the window. A man brought a cup of coffee to the woman. In an office building, people paced around holding notebooks. In another room, a girl and an elderly man embraced tightly. A man took a photo of a woman, a little girl, and an elderly man. The woman held up a sign shaped like an airplane.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, ancient age, modern age or future?(Does the technology exists on earth?)
Are there more then five different places appear in the video(scene switch doesn't necessarily means a place change)?
Is there more than three different characters appear(not including people in the background)?
what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
Where does the video take place? Indoors or outdoors?

breakpoint.question: Is it at day time or night time?
how many people appear in the scene?
Is there more than three people?
Is it at day time or night time?
what's the gender of the person in the middle of the scene?
Is there more than five people?
what's the color of the woman's hair?
where is the scene?
breakpoint.answer: Inside an office, maybe a conference room.
